definition: high post and generous salary (idiom); promotion to a high official position
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: His manner reeks high position with high pay.
sentences.chinese: 他的氣派表現得好像是個高官厚祿的人物。

sentences.english: The Qing army sent a letter to him to induce him to capitulate , promising to give him a high office and fat salary .
sentences.chinese: 清軍給史可法送來了勸降信，答應給他高官厚祿。
